thread.title: bad experience
thread.title_full: bad experience - Review of 6 Columbus - A SIXTY Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: msdbiz
title: bad experience
text: they didn't charge me when I did the booking and when they charged me (two weeks later) the acount was short of balance so they cancel my booking. They kept charging my credit card untill they got the payment and witgour allowing me to stay in the room. manager reaction to the incident was disappointing.
